1.text: And in that day thou shalt say, I will give thanks unto thee, O LORD; for though thou wast angry with me, thine anger is turned away, and thou comfortest me.

2.text: Behold, God is my salvation; I will trust, and will not be afraid: for the LORD JEHOVAH is my strength and song; and he is become my salvation.

3.text: Therefore with joy shall ye draw water out of the wells of salvation.

4.text: And in that day shall ye say, Give thanks unto the LORD, call upon his name, declare his doings among the peoples, make mention that his name is exalted.

5.text: Sing unto the LORD; for he hath done excellent things: let this be known in all the earth.

6.text: Cry aloud and shout, thou inhabitant of Zion: for great is the Holy One of Israel in the midst of thee.
